Content: A workshop to educate Army personnel in all formations under the Security Force Headquarters - West (SFHQ-West) on ‘hydrophobia’ took place on Tuesday (31) at the Sri Lanka Army General Service Corps auditorium in Panagoda. A total of 110 Army personnel including Officers on the directions of Major General Sathyapriya Liyanage, Commander, Security Forces - West (SF-West) participated in the programme. Dr Palitha Weeratunge, Veterinary Surgeon in the District Coordination Office delivered the lecture. Deputy District Directress Ms N. Wijeratne was also present during the workshop.
